data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 102,927 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Mumbai Suburban.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mumbai Suburban, Maharashtra, India

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Mumbai Suburban, Maharashtra, India to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Mumbai Suburban, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Mumbai Suburban. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Bedar (Hindu traditions) people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Bedar (Hindu traditions) people.
Spirit, please defend the 102,927 believers in Mumbai Suburban against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Mumbai Suburban, Maharashtra, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the county of Mumbai Suburban, Maharashtra, India has a population of 9,357,000.

We estimate Mumbai Suburban has 102,927 people who might know Jesus, 113,531 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,140,542 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Mumbai Suburban, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.
